code: import{ALERT_ON,ALERT_OFF}from"../mainConstant/index";var initilState=false;export var isAlert=function isAlert(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initilState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ALERT_ON:return true;case ALERT_OFF:return false;default:return state;}};
